faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything CTOs need to know about switching from Fivetran

items.question: How much can we realistically save?
items.answer: Our customers typically save $40,000-$120,000 annually compared to Fivetran Enterprise. That's not including the hidden costs of MAR overages, connector fees, and support charges. Use our ROI calculator for your specific situation.

items.question: Can this actually replace Fivetran for enterprise workloads?
items.answer: Yes. We process the same data types, support the same databases, and exceed Fivetran's performance benchmarks. Plus, you get features Fivetran charges extra for: real-time sync, unlimited connections, and custom transformations.

items.question: How complex is migrating from Fivetran?
items.answer: We provide a complete migration toolkit and dedicated engineering support. Most customers complete migration in 2-4 weeks with zero downtime. We guarantee equivalent or better performance from day one.

items.question: What about support and maintenance?
items.answer: Our enterprise support includes 24/7 monitoring, dedicated engineers, and guaranteed response times. Many customers find it superior to Fivetran's support because we actually understand your deployment.

items.question: What's the catch? This seems too good to be true.
items.answer: No catch. We're open-source, so you're not paying for our sales team, marketing budget, or VC returns. You're paying for infrastructure and optionally for support. The technology is proven by 500+ production deployments.
